Fabric_Mapping_Service_Full_Display_Name: Microsoft Fabric Reference Table & Data Mapping Service
Fabric_Mapping_Service_Description: A comprehensive reference table (KeyMapping) and data mapping service that enables data classification, harmonization, and transformation for Microsoft Fabric.
Mapping_Service_GetStarted_Docs_Introduc: Learn how to use the Fabric Mapping Service
Mapping_Service_GetStarted_Docs_Descript: Quick start guide and comprehensive documentation for creating reference tables and data mappings.
Reference_Tables_Guide_Introduction: Master reference tables for data classification
Reference_Tables_Guide_Description: Learn how to create and use reference tables as KeyMapping outports for data harmonization and classification.
Attribute_Mapping_Guide_Description: Guide to using custom attributes for flexible data transformation between different schemas.
ReferenceTableItem_Description: Create and manage reference tables for data classification and harmonization. Provides KeyMapping outports for consumption by other data products.
MappingConfigurationItem_Description: Define attribute-based mappings between source and target data types for data transformation.
MappingJobItem_Description: Execute and monitor data mapping operations based on configured mappings.
